statements: DELETE FROM financial_portfolio WHERE portfolio_id = 100 AND risk_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM financial_portfolio WHERE total_value < 50000 AND stress_test_result = true;
DELETE FROM financial_portfolio WHERE risk_level = 'Medium' OR total_value > 100000;
DELETE FROM public.portfolio_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks' AND asset_value < 1000;
DELETE FROM public.financial_portfolio WHERE risk_level > 5 AND stress_test_passed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM public.financial_portfolio WHERE portfolio_id IN (SELECT portfolio_id FROM public.portfolio_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Bonds');
DELETE FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 123 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' AND asset_value < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM Portfolio WHERE portfolio_name LIKE '%Tech%';
DELETE FROM Portfolio WHERE portfolio_name LIKE '%Technology%';
